title: Why are you doing what youre doing
excerpt: If you find yourself doing something and you don’t yet know the answer to that question, maybe it’s about time you asked.

children.text: If you find yourself doing something and you don’t yet know the answer to that question, maybe it’s about time you asked.
Why am I doing this (or not doing this?) Why do I believe what I believe?
And then ask again. And again. And again.
) principle. A fundamental truth. The foundation for a worldview or a brand of knowledge or a chain of reasoning or a mode of behavior.
Past your cultural biases, your assumptions or your unconscious predispositions. Beyond analogy or deduction or doubt.
If you indubitably know why you’re doing what you're doing, it’s a lot easier to realize what you should be doing next, and why.
